0.question: A vending machine accepts only nickels and dimes. A bag of chips cost 85 cents. Kristen has 4 dimes and enough nickels to get the bag of chips. How many nickels does Kristen have?

1.question: Kimberly gave 3 of her 10 nickels to Ben. They then had the same amount of money. How much money did Ben have at first?

2.question: If Tommy had 7 more baseball cards, he would have twice as many as Luis. Tommy has 19 baseball cards. How many baseball cards does Luis have?

3.question: Mrs. Carson had 32 cupcakes. She gave an equal number of cupcakes to each of her 9 students. She brought the remaining ones home. How many cupcakes did Mrs. Carson bring home?

4.question: Andrew needs 9 rubberbands for each puppet he makes. He has 77 rubberbands. How many puppets can Andrew make?
